posts.post_content:
Posted By: Brian C.
These rarely come up. I have two, so I thought I'd offer another collector my second one. An SGC 50 Ten Million sold in Goodwin's May 2007 auction for $2,207 so I'm using that as a base price. My SGC 30 is priced at $1,750 or best offer close to it. I'd also consider trades, particularly for Bregstone and American League Publishing Co. postcards I need. It's a beautiful looking card. Emails have priority over posts. The price does not include shipping and insurance. All sales final since it's a graded card. Checks only, please.

SGC 30 Ten Million front:
[IMG]http://i79.photobucket.com/albums/j154/bcampf/SGC3010MillionFront.jpg[/IMG]

SGC 30 Ten Million back:
[IMG]http://i79.photobucket.com/albums/j154/bcampf/SGC3010MillionBack.jpg[/IMG]

best of luck with your sale.

MS

Posted By: Brian C.
I'm glad you posted the history, thanks. It's a great card and it is available.

Posted By: Brian McQueen

Brian - terrific card; and Michael - thank you for posting that article.  I learned something today.  Good luck with the sale!
